Text: Top album saw them years back in 1987 in Manchester uk at the International one club Longsite manchester..cheers for this xx

Been looking for this.  Saw them twice in the mid-80s and it was one of the wildest times I'd had.  Every other band today is "independent."  This sound was once unique.  Once that meant financial and artistic risk...so listen and learn and enjoy.  Thanks, palmau.
